prompt: love the results but it think its a job for you orchestrador to have it uptodate, create a plan where you create a folder with screenshots of the whole site, but organised in jrouneys
summary:
*Intention*: Create orchestrator-maintained screenshot library organized by user journeys
*Implementation*: Created folder structure for 110 screenshots across guest/host/shared journeys, plus README, capture plan, and log
*Changes*: `orchestrator/assets/screenshots/README.md`, `_capture-plan.md`, `_capture-log.md`, folder structure
*Next*: Execute Phase 1 capture (public pages) upon approval
complete:
## Screenshot Library Plan Complete

I've created a centralized, journey-organized screenshot library structure:

### Folder Structure Created

```
orchestrator/assets/screenshots/
├── README.md                    ← Purpose & usage guide
├── _capture-plan.md             ← 110 screenshots across all journeys
├── _capture-log.md              ← Tracking when captures were taken
│
├── guest-journeys/
│   ├── 01-discovery/            ← Homepage → Search
│   ├── 02-listing-detail/       ← Listing pages
│   ├── 03-proposal-flow/        ← Submit proposal
│   ├── 04-my-stays/             ← Guest dashboard
│   └── 05-messages/             ← Messaging
│
├── host-journeys/
│   ├── 01-acquisition/          ← List with us
│   ├── 02-onboarding/           ← Create listing flow
│   ├── 03-dashboard/            ← Host overview ✅ 1 captured
│   ├── 04-manage-listing/       ← Edit listing
│   ├── 05-proposals/            ← Review proposals
│   ├── 06-leases/               ← Manage leases
│   └── 07-house-manual/         ← House manuals
│
├── shared-journeys/
│   ├── 01-authentication/       ← Login/Signup
│   ├── 02-support/              ← FAQ/Help
│   └── 03-policies/             ← Terms/Privacy
│
└── mobile/                      ← Same structure, 375px viewport
```

### Capture Plan Summary

| Category | Screenshots | Status |
|----------|-------------|--------|
| Guest Journeys | 34 (17 desktop + 17 mobile) | ⏳ Pending |
| Host Journeys | 54 (27 desktop + 27 mobile) | 1 done, 53 pending |
| Shared Journeys | 22 (11 desktop + 11 mobile) | ⏳ Pending |
| **Total** | **110** | **1 done** |

### How Agents Will Use This

Instead of capturing their own screenshots, agents reference the library:
```markdown
Based on orchestrator screenshots:
- `host-journeys/03-dashboard/01-host-overview-default.png`

Observations: [Analysis based on actual current state]
```

**Want me to execute Phase 1 (public pages) now?** This would capture ~28 screenshots of homepage, search, listing detail, and support pages without needing login.

~~~ FOR SLACK ~~~

*Implementation*: Created folder structure for 110 screenshots across guest/host/shared journeys, plus README, capture plan, and log
